effect.sun_moon: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Badly poisons the target. Never misses when used by a poison-type Pokémon.

short_effect.sun_moon: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Badly poisons the target, inflicting more damage every turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.
